summary.span: 提供建立、複製、刪除、移動和開啟檔案的屬性和執行個體方法，並協助建立 物件。

span.span: Provides properties and instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of objects.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用一般作業，例如複製、 移動、 重新命名、 建立、 開啟、 刪除和附加至檔案的類別。Use the class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, opening, deleting, and appending to files. 如果您正在執行多個作業相同的檔案，它可以使用更有效率執行個體方法，而不是對應靜態方法類別，因為安全性檢查不一定是必要的。If you are performing multiple operations on the same file, it can be more efficient to use instance methods instead of the corresponding static methods of the class, because a security check will not always be necessary. 許多方法會傳回其他 I/O 類型，當您建立或開啟檔案。Many of the methods return other I/O types when you create or open files. 您可以使用這些其他型別來進一步操作檔案。You can use these other types to further manipulate a file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱特定這類成員， ， ， ，或。For more information, see specific members such as , , , , or . 根據預設，所有使用者已授都與至新的檔案的完整讀取/寫入存取。By default, full read/write access to new files is granted to all users. 下表描述用於自訂的各種行為的列舉型別方法。The following table describes the enumerations that are used to customize the behavior of various methods. |列舉Enumeration|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||指定讀取和寫入檔案的存取權。Specifies read and write access to a file.| ||指定允許已在使用檔案的存取層級。Specifies the level of access permitted for a file that is already in use.| ||指定是否保留或覆寫現有檔案的內容和要求以建立現有的檔案是否造成例外狀況。Specifies whether the contents of an existing file are preserved or overwritten, and whether requests to create an existing file cause an exception.| > [!NOTE] > 在接受的路徑做為輸入字串的成員，該路徑必須是格式正確，或例外狀況。In members that accept a path as an input string, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised. 比方說，如果路徑是完整的但以空格開頭，路徑不被修剪中類別的方法。For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space, the path is not trimmed in methods of the class. 因此，路徑的格式不正確，而且會引發例外狀況。Therefore, the path is malformed and an exception is raised. 同樣地，路徑的組合不被完整的兩倍。Similarly, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice. 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows 」 也會引發例外狀況在大部分情況下。For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception in most cases. 請確定您的路徑是語式正確的當您使用接受路徑字串的方法。Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string. 接受路徑的成員，在路徑可以參考到檔案或只是目錄。In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or just a directory. 指定的路徑也可以參考相對路徑或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑的伺服器和共用的名稱。The specified path can also refer to a relative path or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name. 例如，下列所有條件都是可接受的路徑：For example, all the following are acceptable paths: - "c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt"。"c:\\\MyDir\\\MyFile.txt" in C#, or "c:\MyDir\MyFile.txt" in Visual Basic. - "c:\\\MyDir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。"c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic. - 「 MyDir\\\MySubdir 」 以 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。"MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic. - 「\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare 」 在 C# 中，或 「\\\MyServer\MyShare 「 在 Visual Basic 中。"\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic. 類別提供下列屬性可讓您擷取檔案的相關資訊。The class provides the following properties that enable you to retrieve information about a file. 如需如何使用每個屬性的範例，請參閱屬性頁。For an example of how to use each property, see the property pages. - 屬性擷取物件，代表檔案的上層目錄。The property retrieves an object that represents the parent directory of a file. - 屬性擷取檔案的父目錄的完整路徑。The property retrieves the full path of the parent directory of a file. - 屬性檢查檔案是否存在，才能進行運算。The property checks for the presence of a file before operating on it. - 屬性擷取或設定值，這個值會指定是否可以修改檔案。The property retrieves or sets a value that specifies whether a file can be modified. - 擷取檔案的大小。The retrieves the size of a file. - 擷取檔案的名稱。The retrieves the name of a file. ## Examples 下列範例示範一些主要成員`FileInfo`類別。The following example demonstrates some of the main members of the `FileInfo` class. 當第一次擷取屬性時，呼叫方法和快取檔案的相關資訊。When the properties are first retrieved, calls the method and caches information about the file. 在後續呼叫中，您必須呼叫取得資訊的最新的複本。On subsequent calls, you must call to get the latest copy of the information. [!code-cpp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CPP/finfo class.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/CS/finfo class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[FInfo Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/FInfo Class/VB/finfo class.vb#1)] 這個範例會產生類似下列的輸出。This example produces output similar to the following. ``` Hello And Welcome C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70AB.tmp was copied to C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp. C:\Users\userName\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp70CB.tmp was successfully deleted. ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Decrypt() cil managed

summary.span: 解密目前帳戶使用 方法加密的檔案。

span.span: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您將使用加密檔案解密方法。The method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the method. 方法可以解密使用目前的使用者帳戶已加密的檔案。The method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account. 這兩個方法和方法使用的電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Both the method and the method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method. 目前的檔案系統必須格式化為 NTFS，且目前的作業系統必須 Microsoft Windows NT 或更新版本。The current file system must be formatted as NTFS and the current operating system must be Microsoft Windows NT or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法和來加密和解密的檔案，然後的方法。The following code example uses the method and the method to encrypt and then decrypt a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開啟的檔案，其中一個已存在的檔案路徑，或如果不存在的話，會建立新的檔案。The method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist. 現有的檔案，它不會將新的文字附加至現有的文字。For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text. 相反地，它會覆寫現有的字元與新的字元。Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters. 如果您覆寫較長的字串 （例如，"This is OpenWrite 方法的測試)"使用較短的字串 （例如 [第二個執行]），檔案會包含字串的混合 (「 第二個 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。If you overwrite a longer string (such as "This is a test of the OpenWrite method") with a shorter string (like "Second run"), the file will contain a mix of the strings ("Second runtest of the OpenWrite method"). ## Examples 下列範例會開啟檔案進行寫入，並接著從檔案讀取。The following example opens a file for writing and then reads from the file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用目前所描述之檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容物件。The method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of the file described by the current object. 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced. 最後，它會傳回新描述覆寫的檔案的物件。Finally, it returns a new object that describes the overwritten file. > [!CAUTION] > 如果這個方法會成功在 Windows 2000 環境`destFileName`處於唯讀狀態，並將不會引發例外狀況。This method will succeed in Windows 2000 environments if the `destFileName` is read-only and will not raise an exception. 使用屬性來檢查目的地檔案然後再嘗試要取代它是否為唯讀。Use the property to check if the destination file is read-only before attempting to replace it. 傳遞`null`至`destBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。Pass `null` to the `destBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來取代檔案與另一個檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份。The following example uses the method to replace a file with another file and create a backup of the replaced file. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAccessControl(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity fileSecurity) cil managed

param.name: fileSecurity
param.span: 物件，該物件描述要套用至目前檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

span.span: A object that describes an access control list (ACL) entry to apply to the current file.

summary.span: 將 物件所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目套用至目前 物件所描述的檔案。

span.span: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a object to the file described by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的目前檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。The method applies access control list (ACL) entries to the current file that represents the noninherited ACL list. 使用方法，每當您需要新增或移除檔案的 ACL 項目。Use the method whenever you need to add or remove ACL entries from a file. > [!CAUTION] > 指定 ACL`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file. 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用方法來取得現有的 ACL，修改它，然後使用套用回到檔案。To add permissions for a new user, use the method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use to apply it back to the file. ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md). 方法仍然只存在物件建立後已修改的物件。The method persists only objects that have been modified after object creation. 如果不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。If a object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file. 因此，不可以擷取物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a object from one file and reapply the same object to another file. 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個：To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1. 使用方法來擷取從原始程式檔的物件。Use the method to retrieve the object from the source file. 2. 建立新目的地檔案的物件。Create a new object for the destination file. 3. 使用或來源方法擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。Use the or method of the source object to retrieve the ACL information. 4. 使用或方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中物件。Use the or method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination object. 5. 設定目的地物件到目的地檔案時使用方法。Set the destination object to the destination file using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法和方法加入和從檔案中移除的 ACL 項目。The following code example uses the method and the method to add and then remove an ACL entry from a file. 您必須提供有效的使用者或群組帳戶，才能執行這個範例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.FileInfo.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將路徑當做字串傳回。

span.span: Returns the path as a string.
A string representing the path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的字串方法表示已傳遞給建構函式的路徑。The string returned by the method represents path that was passed to the constructor. 當您建立物件使用建構函式，方法會傳回完整的路徑。When you create a object using the constructors, the method returns the fully qualified path. 不過，有些情況所傳回的字串是方法不是完整的路徑。However, there are cases where the string returned by the method does not represent the fully qualified path. 例如，當您建立物件使用方法，方法不是完整的路徑。For example, when you create a object using the method, the method does not represent the fully qualified path.
